00132             function                get_client_language()
00133             {
00134                   $Splits = array();
00135                   
00136                   foreach( explode( ',' , @$_SERVER[ 'HTTP_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE' ] ) as $Lang )
00137                   {
00138                         $Pattern = '/^(?P<primarytag>[a-zA-Z]{2,8})'.
00139                         '(?:-(?P<subtag>[a-zA-Z]{2,8}))?(?:(?:;q=)'.
00140                         '(?P<quantifier>\d\.\d))?$/';
00141 
00142                         if( preg_match( $Pattern , $Lang , $Splits ) )
00143                         {
00144                               return( $Splits[ 'primarytag' ] );
00145                         }
00146                   }
00147 
00148                   return( false );
00149             }

00169             function                pre_generation( $Options )
00170             {
00171                   try
00172                   {
00173                         $Path = _get_package_relative_path_ex( 'lang' , '1.0.0' );
00174                         $ScriptFilePath = $Path.'/include/js/lang.core.'.$this->Language.'.js';
00175                         
00176                         if( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_exists( $ScriptFilePath ) === false )
00177                         {
00178                               $this->PageComposerUtilities->add_javascript( '{http_host}/'.$ScriptFilePath );
00179                               $Content = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'lang.core.js.tpl' );
00180                               $Content = str_replace( '{locale}' , $this->Language , $Content );
00181                               $this->CachedMultyFS->file_put_contents( $ScriptFilePath , $Content );
00182                         }
00183                         
00184                         $this->PageComposerUtilities->add_javascript( '{http_host}/'.$ScriptFilePath );
00185                         
00186                         $this->include_strings_js( 'lang' );
00187                   }
00188                   catch( Exception $e )
00189                   {
00190                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00191                   }

00216             function                dispatch_string_data( $RawData )
00217             {
00218                   try
00219                   {
00220                         $tmp1 = explode( '=' , $RawData );
00221                         
00222                         if( strpos( $tmp1[ 0 ] , '|' ) === false )
00223                         {
00224                               return( array( $tmp1[ 0 ] , 'default' , str_replace( '[eq]' , '=' , $tmp1[ 1 ] ) ) );
00225                         }
00226                         else
00227                         {
00228                               $tmp2 = explode( '|' , $tmp1[ 0 ] );
00229                               return( array_merge( $tmp2 , array( str_replace( '[eq]' , '=' , $tmp1[ 1 ] ) ) ) );
00230                         }
00231                   }
00232                   catch( Exception $e )
00233                   {
00234                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00235                   }
00236             }

00260             function                include_strings( $PackageName , $PackageVersion = 'last' )
00261             {
00262                   try
00263                   {
00264                         $Path = _get_package_relative_path_ex( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
00265                         $TopPackageName = _get_top_package_name( $PackageName );
00266                         $LanguageFilePath = $Path.'/res/lang/'.$TopPackageName.'.'.$this->Language;
00267                         
00268                         if( file_exists( $LanguageFilePath ) )
00269                         {
00270                               $RawData = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $LanguageFilePath , 'cleaned' );
00271                               $this->load_data( $RawData );
00272                         }
00273                   }
00274                   catch( Exception $e )
00275                   {
00276                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00302             function                include_strings_js( $PackageName , $PackageVersion = 'last' )
00303             {
00304                   try
00305                   {
00306                         $Path = _get_package_relative_path_ex( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
00307                         $TopPackageName = _get_top_package_name( $PackageName );
00308                         $LangFilePath = $Path.'/res/lang/'.$TopPackageName.'.'.$this->Language;
00309 
00310                         if( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_exists( $LangFilePath ) )
00311                         {
00315                               $ScriptFilePath = $Path.'/include/js/'.$TopPackageName.'.'.$this->Language.'.js';
00316                               
00317                               mkdir_ex( $Path.'/include/' );
00318                               mkdir_ex( $Path.'/include/js/' );
00319                               
00320                               if( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_exists( $ScriptFilePath ) === false || 
00321                                     $this->Cache->get_data( $ScriptFilePath ) === false )
00322                               {
00326                                     $Strings = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $LangFilePath , 'exploded' );
00327                                     
00330                                     $Script = '';
00331                                     foreach( $Strings as $k => $v )
00332                                     {
00333                                           list( $StringAlias , $Condition , $Translation ) = $this->dispatch_string_data( $v );
00334                                           $Translation = str_replace( "'" , "\\'" , $Translation );
00335                                           $Script .= "if( !ultimix.lang.Strings[ ultimix.lang.Locale ][ '$StringAlias' ] ) ".
00336                                                                   "ultimix.lang.Strings[ ultimix.lang.Locale ][ '$StringAlias' ] = {};\r\n";
00337                                           $Script .= "ultimix.lang.Strings[ ultimix.lang.Locale ]".
00338                                                 "[ '$StringAlias' ][ '$Condition' ] = '".trim( $Translation , '/' )."';\r\n";
00339                                     }
00340                                     
00341                                     $this->CachedMultyFS->file_put_contents( $ScriptFilePath , $Script );
00342                               }
00343                               
00344                               $this->PageComposerUtilities->add_javascript( '{http_host}/'.$ScriptFilePath );
00345                         }
00346                   }
00347                   catch( Exception $e )
00348                   {
00349                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00350                   }
00351             }

00371             function                get_list_of_languages()
00372             {
00373                   try
00374                   {
00375                         $Languages = file_get_contents( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cf_lang_list' );
00376                         $Languages = str_replace( "\r" , "\n" , $Languages );
00377                         $Languages = str_replace( "\n\n" , "\n" , $Languages );
00378                         $Languages = explode( "\n" , $Languages );
00379                         
00380                         return( $Languages );
00381                   }
00382                   catch( Exception $e )
00383                   {
00384                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00385                   }
00386             }

00406             function                get_locale()
00407             {
00408                   try
00409                   {
00410                         if( $this->Language === false )
00411                         {
00412                               if( $this->LangList === false )
00413                               {
00414                                     $this->LangList = $this->get_list_of_languages();
00415                               }
00416                               if( $this->Security->get_c( 'client_lang' ) )
00417                               {
00418                                     $this->Language = $this->Security->get_c( 'client_lang' , 'command' );
00419                               }
00420                               elseif( ( $Key = array_search( $this->get_client_language() , $this->LangList ) ) !== false )
00421                               {
00422                                     $this->Language = $this->LangList[ $Key ];
00423                               }
00424                               else
00425                               {
00426                                     $this->Language = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_config( __FILE__ , 'cf_locale_conf' );
00427                               }
00428                         }
00429                         
00430                         return( $this->Language );
00431                   }
00432                   catch( Exception $e )
00433                   {
00434                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00435                   }
00436             }

00456             function                load_data( $RawData )
00457             {
00458                   try
00459                   {
00460                         if( strlen( $RawData ) )
00461                         {
00462                               $RawData = explode( "\n" , $RawData );
00463                               
00464                               foreach( $RawData as $rd )
00465                               {
00466                                     list( $StringAlias , $Condition , $Translation ) = $this->dispatch_string_data( $rd );
00467                                     
00468                                     if( isset( $this->StringSet[ $StringAlias ] ) === false )
00469                                     {
00470                                           $this->StringSet[ $StringAlias ] = array();
00471                                     }
00472                                     
00473                                     $this->StringSet[ $StringAlias ][ $Condition ] = $Translation;
00474                               }
00475                         }
00476                   }
00477                   catch( Exception $e )
00478                   {
00479                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00480                   }
00481             }

00497             function                load_translations()
00498             {
00499                   try
00500                   {
00501                         if( $this->AutoTranslationsWereLoaded === false )
00502                         {
00503                               $this->get_locale();
00504                               
00505                               $Paths = _get_loaded_packages_paths();
00506                               foreach( $Paths as $p )
00507                               {
00508                                     $PackagePath = _get_top_package_name( $p[ 'package_name' ] );
00509                                     $LanguageFilePath = $p[ 'directory' ].'/res/lang/'.$PackagePath.'.'.$this->Language;
00510                                     
00511                                     if( file_exists( $LanguageFilePath ) )
00512                                     {
00513                                           $RawData = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $LanguageFilePath , 'cleaned' );
00514                                           $this->load_data( $RawData );
00515                                     }
00516                               }
00517                               
00518                               $this->AutoTranslationsWereLoaded = true;
00519                         }
00520                   }
00521                   catch( Exception $e )
00522                   {
00523                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00524                   }
00525             }

00553             function                get_string( $StringAlias , $Value = 'default' )
00554             {
00555                   try
00556                   {
00557                         if( isset( $this->StringSet[ $StringAlias ] ) === false || 
00558                               ( $Value == 'default' && isset( $this->StringSet[ $StringAlias ][ $Value ] ) === false ) )
00559                         {
00560                               return( $StringAlias );
00561                         }
00562                         
00563                         if( $Value == 'default' && isset( $this->StringSet[ $StringAlias ][ 'default' ] ) !== false )
00564                         {
00565                               return( $this->StringSet[ $StringAlias ][ 'default' ] );
00566                         }
00567                         
00568                         foreach( $this->StringSet[ $StringAlias ] as $Pattern => $LocalizedString )
00569                         {
00570                               if( preg_match( $Pattern , "$Value" ) )
00571                               {
00572                                     return( str_replace( '{value}' , $Value , $LocalizedString ) );
00573                               }
00574                         }
00575                         
00576                         return( $StringAlias );
00577                   }
00578                   catch( Exception $e )
00579                   {
00580                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00581                   }
00582             }

00610             function                process_lang_block( $Str , &$Changed )
00611             {
00612                   try
00613                   {
00616                         $Str = $this->String->show_block( 
00617                               $Str , 'lang:'.$this->Language , 'lang:~'.$this->Language , $Changed
00618                         );
00619                         
00620                         $ListOfLanguages = $this->get_list_of_languages();
00621                         
00624                         foreach( $ListOfLanguages as $v )
00625                         {
00626                               $Str = $this->String->hide_block( $Str , 'lang:'.$v , 'lang:~'.$v , $Changed );
00627                         }
00628                         
00629                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00630                   }
00631                   catch( Exception $e )
00632                   {
00633                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00634                   }
00635             }

00663             function                process_lang_file( $Str , &$Changed )
00664             {
00665                   try
00666                   {
00669                         for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'lang_file' ) ; )
00670                         {
00671                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
00672                               $PackageName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' );
00673                               $PackageVersion = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
00674                               
00675                               $PackagePath = _get_package_path_ex( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
00676 
00677                               $RawData = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( 
00678                                     $PackagePath.'/res/lang/'._get_top_package_name( $PackageName ).'.'.$this->Language , 'cleaned'
00679                               );
00680                               
00681                               $this->load_data( $RawData );
00682                               
00683                               $Str = str_replace( "{lang_file:$MacroParameters}" , '' , $Str );
00684                               $Changed = true;
00685                         }
00686                         
00687                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00688                   }
00689                   catch( Exception $e )
00690                   {
00691                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00692                   }
00693             }

00773             function                process_lang( $Str , &$Changed )
00774             {
00775                   try
00776                   {
00777                         for( ; ( $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'lang' , 
00778                                                                                                       array( 'value' => TERMINAL_VALUE ) ) ) !== false ; )
00779                         {
00780                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( 'string='.$Parameters );
00781                               $StringAlias = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'string' );
00782                               $Value = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'value' , 'default' );
00783                               $TransformedString = $this->get_string( $StringAlias , $Value );
00784                               
00785                               if( $TransformedString == $StringAlias )
00786                               {
00787                                     $DefaultTransform = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'default' , false );
00788                                     $TransformedString = 
00789                                           $DefaultTransform === false ? $TransformedString : "{lang:$DefaultTransform}";
00790                               }
00791 
00792                               $Str = str_replace( "{lang:$Parameters}" , $TransformedString , $Str );
00793                               $Changed = true;
00794                         }
00795                         
00796                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00797                   }
00798                   catch( Exception $e )
00799                   {
00800                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00801                   }
00802             }

00830             function                process_iconv( $Str , &$Changed )
00831             {
00832                   try
00833                   {
00834                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'iconv' ) ; )
00835                         {
00836                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00837                               $Data = $this->String->get_block_data( $Str , "iconv:$Parameters" , '~iconv' );
00838                               $ConvertedData = iconv( 
00839                                     $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'in_charset' ) , 
00840                                     $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'out_charset' , 'UTF-8' ) , $Data
00841                               );
00842                               
00843                               $Str = str_replace( "{iconv:$Parameters}$Data{~iconv}" , $ConvertedData , $Str );
00844                               $Changed = true;
00845                         }
00846                         
00847                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00848                   }
00849                   catch( Exception $e )
00850                   {
00851                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00852                   }
00853             }

00881             function                process_locale( $Str , &$Changed )
00882             {
00883                   try
00884                   {
00885                         if( strpos( $Str , '{locale}' ) !== false )
00886                         {
00887                               $Str = str_replace( '{locale}' , $this->Language , $Str );
00888                               $Changed = true;
00889                         }
00890                         
00891                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00892                   }
00893                   catch( Exception $e )

00929             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00930             {
00931                   try
00932                   {
00933                         $this->get_locale();
00934                         $this->load_translations();
00935 
00936                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_lang_block( $Str , $Changed );
00937                         
00938                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_lang_file( $Str , $Changed );
00939                         
00940                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_lang_file_js( $Str , $Changed );
00941                         
00942                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_lang( $Str , $Changed );
00943                         
00944                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_iconv( $Str , $Changed );
00945                         
00946                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_locale( $Str , $Changed );
00947                         
00948                         return( $Str );
00949                   }
00950                   catch( Exception $e )
00951                   {
00952                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00953                   }
00954             }

00978             function                process_object( $Object )
00979             {
00980                   try
00981                   {
00982                         $Changed = false;
00983                         if( is_array( $Object ) || is_object( $Object ) )
00984                         {
00985                               foreach( $Object as $k => $s )
00986                               {
00987                                     set_field( $Object , $k , $this->process_object( $s ) );
00988                               }
00989                               
00990                               return( $Object );
00991                         }
00992                         else
00993                         {
00994                               return( $this->process_string( false , $Object , $Changed ) );
00995                         }
00996                   }
00997                   catch( Exception $e )
00998                   {
00999                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01000                   }
01001             }

01013             var                           $Output;
01014             
01025             var                           $LangList = false;
01026             
01045             function                set_locale_form( $Options )
01046             {
01047                   try
01048                   {
01049                         if( $this->LangList == false )
01050                         {
01051                               $this->LangList = $this->get_list_of_languages();
01052                         }
01053                         
01054                         $Form = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'lang_form.tpl' );
01055                         $this->Output = $Form;
01056                         
01057                         foreach( $this->LangList as $Lang )
01058                         {
01059                               $LangFlag = $Lang === $this->get_locale() ? 'active' : 'inactive';
01060                               
01061                               $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , $LangFlag.'_lang.tpl' );
01062                               
01063                               $Template = str_replace( '{client_lang}' , $Lang , $Template );
01064                               $this->Output = str_replace( '{lang_list}' , "$Template{lang_list}" , $this->Output );
01065                         }
01066                   }
01067                   catch( Exception $e )
01068                   {
01069                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01070                   }
01071             }

01091             function                view( $Options )
01092             {
01093                   try
01094                   {
01095                         if( $Options->get_setting( 'lang_file' , false ) )
01096                         {
01097                               $ComponentHTML = '{lang_file:'.$Options->get_all_settings().'}';
01098                               $Changed = false;
01099                               $ComponentHTML = $this->process_string( $Options , $ComponentHTML , $Changed );
01100                               return( '' );
01101                         }
01102                   
01103                         $Context = get_package( 'gui::context' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
01104 
01105                         $Context->load_config( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_set_locale_form' );
01106                         if( $Context->execute( $Options , $this ) )return( $this->Output );
01107                   }
01108                   catch( Exception $e )
01109                   {
01110                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01111                   }
01112             }
